title: Interpretation of a dream about broken teeth by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about broken teeth. Interpretation of a dream about broken teeth in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing half a broken tooth in a dream? What is the significance of seeing broken teeth and a lot of blood coming out? Does breaking rotten or black teeth give promising meanings? Learn about the correct interpretations of this vision through the following article. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about broken teeth. Interpretation of a dream about broken teeth indicates deteriorating health and a disease that can cause pain and a feeling of discomfort for the dreamer. Sometimes, the interpretation of seeing broken teeth indicates separation and conflict between the dreamer and one of his loved ones or acquaintances in reality. Age in the dream It refers to a person in the dreamer’s family, which may be from the mother’s or father’s family, depending on the order of age. A broken tooth in a dream is evidence of an illness or problem faced by a man or woman from the dreamer’s family. If the dreamer is in pain while his teeth are broken in the dream, this indicates The disease that one of his relatives suffers from will be difficult, and recovery from it is not an easy matter. If the dreamer sees all his teeth broken and falling out in a dream, he will live in the world for many years until he sees that most of his relatives have died while he is alive. Interpretation of a dream about broken teeth by Ibn SirinIf The dreamer's teeth in a dream have a distinct, clean shape, and he was surprised that they were broken, and this made the shape of his mouth ugly. This is a sign of intense sadness that suddenly invades his life, and therefore the dreamer's happiness in his life will disappear for some time even if he is preparing for a new job or for marriage, and these things will stop and will not be completed. Broken teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicate growing concerns and problems between the dreamer and his family members, and perhaps the relationship between them will weaken and be completely broken over time, and this happens if the dreamer sees that his teeth are completely broken. Broken, and only a small part of them remains in the mouth. Broken yellow teeth in a dream indicate resolving crises, ending sadness, and healing from illness. It also indicates resolving disputes and quarrels that spread between the dreamer and his family during the previous period. If the dreamer sees in a dream dirty black teeth in his mouth After a short period, all of them broke, and he saw white teeth appearing in his mouth instead of his previous teeth in an ugly way. This indicates that he went into a period of frustration and fatigue, but he will overcome the barrier of misery, anguish, and disappointment, and regain his strength and positive energy to live happily ever after. Perhaps he broke. Black teeth in a dream indicate victory or obtaining a legitimate profit away from prohibited money. Ibn Sirin said that the symbol of broken teeth indicates the financial limitations and extreme poverty that the dreamer is currently suffering from. Interpretation of a dream about broken teeth for a single woman. Broken teeth in a single woman’s dream indicate that she feels She feels sad and uncomfortable in her life, and she may live alone and away from people for some time because she is going through a difficult crisis and these are the most important crises she may be exposed to. Reality: or not: the crisis of the death of someone close to the family in doubt

title: The 200 most accurate interpretations of seeing a dead father smiling in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: What you do not know is that you see the deceased father in a dream smiling. The smile of the dead father in the dream brings good news to the fortuneteller. Through the specialized Egyptian website, you will learn about the most important meanings of this dream, and this next article will contain many clues that talk about the father’s smile, anger, and silence. In the dream then the following follows. Seeing a dead father in a dream smiling. Whoever was worried about his deceased father and wanted to know his place in heaven and saw him in a dream smiling, the meaning of the dream is promising and means his comfort in his burial and his enjoyment of God’s bliss in his heaven. The dead man’s smile means the fortuneteller’s happiness and in In the end he will have a bright future and a prosperous life. When a student sees his deceased father smiling at him, and when he sees him in this state he feels reassured, his academic position will advance and what he desires for success will come to him. If a young man sees this dream, he will be happy with a strong job offer that will move him from the simple social level To a stronger level than him, and his physical life will stabilize after a long time he has been there. They suffer from want and poverty. This smile, if the sick person sees it, the world will smile at him, and he will be destined to emerge from the well of his illness and pain. Whoever aspires to a promotion and worked hard to obtain it, the smile of the deceased means achieving the desired goal. If the dreamer’s social life becomes difficult and his conflicts with The outside world makes him feel pain and fear of trouble, and if he smiles at his deceased father in a dream, he will live reassured and his crises will end. After this vision, the dreamer may be happy with a life without envious people who negatively affected him, and because of their intense envy he becomes tired in his life, but his circumstances will change and he will have positive energy and hope in life. If the dreamer is wrongly imprisoned in reality and sees this dream, he will rejoice in his near innocence and gain psychological and physical comfort. Anyone who has lived in a frightening social environment full of harmful people, this dream indicates survival and gaining divine immunity that only those with a pure heart enjoy. If The dreamer lost something valuable in his life and saw his deceased father laughing at him and giving him what he lost, then the dream indicates the coming happiness because the dreamer finds what he lost in reality. Seeing a dead father in a dream smiling according to Ibn SirinIf his father entrusted the dreamer with a will or something important before God delivered him, and indeed The dreamer was able to carry out this will as the deceased asked him and saw him in the dream smiling at him. The dream of him suggests that the father is satisfied with his son for his obedience to him and does not neglect what he asked him about. If the father smiled at his son in the dream and took him to a far away place full of trees and roses, and the dreamer felt happy. And rejoice, knowing that this place is unknown to the pioneer, death is near, but he will enter heaven. And enjoying the position that his father enjoys now. If the dreamer sees his father laughing at him, and when he approaches him, he is surprised that he is a afraid person and not his father, and he continues to run away from him in fear and terror. He spit on his right hand three times and sought refuge in God from the accursed Satan. Seeing a dead father in a dream smiling at single people If an unmarried father died some time ago and he asked her

title: The interpretation of seeing fire in a dream includes the correct interpretations

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream. Fire or fire is considered one of the terrifying things that cause a feeling of fear and terror, due to the destruction of property and physical deformities that can lead to death. There is no doubt that seeing a fire burning in a dream has a negative effect on the dreamer and pushes him to feel negative feelings, to wake a person from his sleep wondering about the meaning of this dream and the signs it sends to him and whether it is a good or bad vision. We will learn about it in detail through the following article of the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream, the symbol of fire in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing fire in a dream in general is one of the good visions that herald the arrival of good news for the dreamer. Whoever sees something burning before his eyes, and the fire emanating from this fire is pure, and there is no smoke mixed with it, this dream symbolizes that the circle of close people surrounding the viewer are good people, pure souls, and they are. All respect and appreciation to him. Ibn Sirin says that fire in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions, as it is a symbol of Hellfire, and it is an indication that the dreamer commits many sins and transgressions that make him worthy of entering Hell. Some interpreters said that seeing fire in a dream symbolizes a high status and positions of prestige that the fortune teller will occupy. Sometimes the interpretation of fire in a dream is jinn and demons, because the Holy Qur’an stated that the jinn are created from fire. Whoever sees himself in the middle of the fire and does not hit him, this dream symbolizes that the dreamer is surrounded by many evil people who show him affection and hate him and want to harm him, but God Almighty saves him from their cunning. One of the warning visions, if one sees that he is eating fire in a dream, this dream means that he is eating people’s money unjustly, and that he enters his house with forbidden money, and it is a warning to stay away from deviant treatment methods. And they ask God for sustenance through legitimate means. Whoever dreams that fire is burning in his heart, this dream symbolizes the feelings of sadness that the dreamer is going through as a result of his separation from someone he loves. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married woman One of the auspicious dreams for a married woman is to see fire in her dream, which is a sign for her that she will soon become pregnant, God willing. But the outbreak of a fire dangerously and sparks flying from it is considered a bad dream as it shows that there are many differences between her and her husband and that she lives in a state of family instability due to these problems. One of the warning dreams for a married woman is that she dreams of performing fire worship rituals, and this dream symbolizes that this woman lives a life full of disobedience and sins, and it is also a sign that she must stop these sins. And return to God Almighty and repent to Him. So that His wrath does not fall upon her. Interpretation of escaping from fire in a dream for a married woman One of the visions that combine good and evil for a married woman is to see in her dream that a fire is breaking out and that she is escaping from this fire, and this dream indicates that this woman will face many problems in her life. To make her sad, but if

title: Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Reciting Surat Al-Baqarah by Ibn Sirin Ibn Shirin believes that reciting Surat Al-Baqarah out loud or in a low voice in a dream is a sign of an increase in his life, God willing, his good relationship with God Almighty, and his great reward from God Almighty. Gambling is wonderful. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Baqarah for a single girl. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Baqarah, this is evidence of her good morals, good upbringing, and her great reward from God Almighty, and that she does not commit sins or any sin that would anger God Almighty. In her life, God willing, with the same interpretation, if she reads Surat Al-Baqarah in her ears. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Baqarah for a married woman. If a married woman reads Surat Al-Baqarah in her dream, this is a sign that she is in a hurry to do good in order to obtain a reward from God Almighty, and this indicates good Her treatment of her husband and his family is good. Relationships with God. It is also a sign of her husband’s good morals and obedience to God Almighty. Surat Al-Baqarah indicates getting rid of problems and material difficulties in her life and getting rid of family problems, God willing. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Baqarah for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Baqarah, this is evidence of her health and safety from all harm and evil, and the inability of anyone to harm her whether Whether it was a human or a jinn. Surah Al-Baqarah also indicates the safety and health of the newborn, as well as its good relationship with God Almighty, and its constant memorization of the Qur’an, especially if its owner recites a verse from the surah along with the surah of the surah. Al-Baqarah. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Baqarah for a man. When a person sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Baqarah, this is evidence of his superiority and skill in his work and his obedience to God Almighty and that he does not commit sins and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream of reading the last chapters of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream. SeeingRead the endings of Surat Al-Baqarah for the dreamer is considered evidence of many filled good deeds. With goodness and blessings. This vision also gives the dreamer confidence in the protection of God Almighty and the facilitation of all matters of his life. The interpretation of the results we have reached in Surah Al-Baqarah for the dreamer is evidence that he has not been harmed and has not been harmed by people, God willing. This dream also suggests that the dreamer is exposed to many difficult problems. But he is able to solve it with wisdom and intelligence. Interpretation of the recitation of the last verses of Surat Al-Baqarah for a married woman. It is believed that reading the end of Surat Al-Baqarah for a married woman lives a beautiful life full of peace and tranquility. This vision also gives the married woman confidence in her life with her husband, her family, and her entire family. The married woman gains kindness, praise, and blessings. Also interpretation of a dreamReadingThe conclusions of Surat Al-Baqarah about a married woman indicate that she will soon be blessed with good offspring.Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Baqarah in the JinnThe interpretation of dreamsRead Surat Al-BaqarahJeans is one of the best dreams that have beautiful and positive results.This vision shows the end of all the dreamer’s problems.If he sees a free girl, this dream is a sign of That all negative people will stay away from it. The interpretation of reading Surah Al-Baqarah gives the dreamer hope in life and enables him to live his life without pessimism.

title: Seeing cats in a dream and being afraid of them for single people

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream and fear of them for a single girl: If a single girl sees a cat in a dream, and it is black, then this vision indicates the presence of a bad friend. Whereas if she sees that she is afraid of a cat in a dream, then this dream shows fear of something related to her life in waking life. Likewise, if he sees a white cat in a dream, this vision shows a hypocritical enemy or a hypocritical friend, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if she sees that cats are trying to harm her in a dream, this dream shows some deception, and it may indicate problems in her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. While If she sees in her dream a black cat kissing her. This vision may indicate that there is a good friend who is trying to do something to please her. Also, if he sees a black cat in a dream, and he is afraid of this cat. This vision indicates an unwanted marriage or it may be flirtation The white sector in an unmarried girl’s maneuvers indicates marriage to someone who loves her and fears for her while she is awake. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream and being afraid of them in a dream for a married woman. Such as a married woman seeing a black cat in a dream. This vision shows that there is a friend who is deceiving her while she is awake. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if he sees that the cat is white in a dream, this vision shows a hidden friend, or an apparent friend, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if she sees that she is afraid of a cat in a dream, then this dream indicates her fear of a problem in her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. While if he sees that it is a cat, he will be afraid of it in the dream. This vision may indicate some marital problems that may be caused by another woman. If she sees that a cat is running after her in a dream, the dream may indicate escaping from a deceitful, malicious woman, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A black cat in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of a deceitful friend. While seeing a white cat in a dream, this indicates the presence of a friend who helps in problems or stands by the woman in waking life. See also: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream and fear of them in A man’s dream and its meaning: If a married man sees that there are a lot of cats in his house in a dream. This vision indicates that this man is married, or that he does not lower his gaze, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if he sees that there is a black cat, he is afraid of it in the dream. He may This vision indicates that there is a malicious woman in this person’s life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees that there is a cat in a dream, this vision may indicate a good wife in his life. It may indicate an obedient wife in the life of the person who has the vision. While if he sees cats She chases him in a dream. This dream may indicate that this person has many lovers. This may indicate that he is a handsome man and that many people love him. And if he sees a yellow cat in his dream, it attacks him. Amend this vision to some obstacles that may be caused by a woman. Perhaps it indicates ill health, and God knows best. Some commentators believe that seeing a cat in a married man’s dream is feminine. It indicates the condition he sees, whether the cat is weak, sick, or something like that.

Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream and fear of them in A man’s dream and its meaning: If a married man sees that there are a lot of cats in his house in a dream. This vision indicates that this man is married, or that he does not lower his gaze, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if he sees that there is a black cat, he is afraid of it in the dream. He may This vision indicates that there is a malicious woman in this person’s life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees that there is a cat in a dream, this vision may indicate a good wife in his life. It may indicate an obedient wife in the life of the person who has the vision. While if he sees cats She chases him in a dream. This dream may indicate that this person has many lovers. This may indicate that he is a handsome man and that many people love him. And if he sees a yellow cat in his dream, it attacks him. Amend this vision to some obstacles that may be caused by a woman. Perhaps it indicates ill health, and God knows best. Some commentators believe that seeing a cat in a married man’s dream is feminine. It indicates the condition he sees, whether the cat is weak, sick, or something like that.

title: What is the interpretation of white shoes in a single woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: White shoes in a dream for a single woman. There are many things that we always see on a daily basis, including white shoes that we want to have, but when we see them in a dream we search for an appropriate practical interpretation of this vision, and through this article we will explain in detail the interpretations. The different interpretations of seeing white shoes in a dream for a single girl and their interpretations and meanings. White shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirinma. Interpretation of seeing white shoes in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about white shoes for single women indicates that this girl will soon be engaged to a respectable person who loves her very much and hopes Her happiness. White shoes are evidence of her good morals and good reputation among people, and the vision also shows the good that will come to her soon. If an unmarried woman sees that her white shoes are getting dirty while she walks, this is evidence that she has assumed many responsibilities that were not appropriate for her age, which led her to live a life Full of difficulties and great sadness. If she sees that these white shoes are not beautiful, this is evidence that there is someone who does not love her and shows the opposite in order to take advantage of her. White shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin showed that if an unmarried woman sees white shoes in her dream, This is a sign that this girl carries a lot of good feelings for those around her. It also indicates that she is pure in heart, and she cannot hate anyone even if it hurts her. White shoes in an unmarried woman’s dream is an indication that she will get the promotion that she dreamed of. It is used in the workplace, and through it she will be able to obtain a better financial income than she was previously. It was also mentioned that the single woman’s vision of white shoes could be a sign of her upcoming journey, through which she will achieve many practical and material successes. Is your dream confused and you do not find an explanation that reassures you? Search via Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website. The most important interpretations of white shoes in a dream for a single woman. She dreamed of white shoes for single women. If an unmarried woman dreams of white shoes, this symbolizes the person she loves and dreams of marrying him, and indeed they will get married, and it is possible that the vision is an indication that she will get On a new job opportunity in her place. She wanted to work and it is considered evidence that she has received some important news that will change her life in the right way. Interpretation of a dream about white sports shoes in a dream for a single woman: A single woman’s vision of sports shoes, and their white color, is a sign that she is a person who loves her work and therefore she will succeed in reaching a prominent position in it and through that. She will obtain excellent material gains and the vision also shows that she will get rid of all the obstacles she is exposed to in her life, making her live a happy and stable life. Sports shoes in an unmarried woman’s dream are evidence that peace and security are the main features of her life and it also indicates that she gets some Money in the form of a family inheritance makes her next life stable

title: Interpretation of thorns in a dream: Seeing thorns being removed from the foot in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Removing thorns Removing thorns in a dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman from her leg A dream of thorns on clothes. Interpretation of thorns in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dreams that we see during sleep can carry many synonyms that are closely related to the real life that the dreamer lives and can symbolize some events that may occur in the future or refer to those that occurred in the past and still affect his daily life. Thorns: The Bedouin is ignorant and difficult, and it is said: temptation or religion. Thorns in a dream are a rough, difficult and difficult person, and thorns said that it is a religion or temptation. And whoever sees: that he runs with doubt, and postpones the religion he asks for, and thorns are ignorant, and he has no religion or scholar, and it is said: thorns hurt, due to their danger. They indicate distress and sadness due to their cruelty, and indicate love and injustice from the wicked, and thorns indicate the harm that you have been exposed to because of the woman. Seeing thorns in a dream indicates anxiety, misery, and failure in any attempt to achieve success and improve conditions. If the thorns are hidden under the green leaves, this indicates that there are enemies who are plotting against you and working to hinder your success and the prosperity of your circumstances. Seeing thorns in a dream means that there are bad people who will insult you. If you see thorns in a dream, this indicates that you are threatened with losing your job, health or money. Seeing thorns in a dream requires the dreamer to be more careful and diplomatic to avoid risks. When he sees trampling thorns, he owes people, and he can pay it, and he is late in paying it, and it was said that seeing thorns: evidence of ignorant or ignorant people, or men who have no religion and no worldly life. It is said that seeing thorns or thorns in a dream or dream is a sign of pain and illness as a result of the sharpness of the thorns. It also indicates worries and pains from the harshness of the thorns. Seeing thorns in a dream indicates love and injustice from the wicked. Seeing thorns in a dream also indicates the abuse that a person suffers from because of a woman. Seeing sleeping on thorns in a dream means that women gossip. Seeing a crown of thorns means losing friendship. Seeing the removal of thorns from the body indicates the elimination of problems and the elimination of worries. Whoever sees in his dream that thorns entered his feet while trying to remove or remove them and did not succeed, this is an indication of the big problems that he will face in the coming period. Alone and without any help. Seeing thorns in the foot indicates the bad condition that the dreamer suffers from, especially if he is sick, but if he dreams that someone is trying to remove them from his feet, this is an indication of the great help that he will receive to get it. Getting rid of his illness Removing thorns from the feet in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is looking for the help he needs from some of the people around him, but he cannot convince them to achieve it. If the dreamer is one of the people who suffer from a lot of debts, and he sees that someone is pulling thorns from his feet, this is a sign that he will be able to help him pay off all his debts. preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about cutting one’s liver from the mouth in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about cutting one’s liver from the mouth in a dream and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people would like to learn. Interpretation. He knows that the site managers do not make interpretations, but they memorize the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about cutting his liver out of the mouth in a dream. A piece of his liver coming out of his mouth in a dream may indicate that he is a person who utters a lot of wrong words and needs to stop doing so. In the case of his personal opinion that Blood clots coming out of his mouth, as this may indicate that this person has deceived others and he must repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. Seeing a piece of liver coming out of the mouth could indicate noticeable changes occurring in the life of the sighted person during this period, and God knows best. If you dream about pus coming out of the left breast, this may indicate many good things that will come to the dreamer in those days. Seeing pus coming out of the left breast in a dream may indicate the near relief that will happen to the dreamer in those days, thanks to God. preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a man with an ugly face in a dream is one of those dreams that causes anxiety, as it can have many meanings, so we learn whether the interpretation of a dream about a man with an ugly face in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man with an ugly face in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man with an ugly face in a dream and seeing an ugly person can indicate forbidden desires, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees an ugly man, it may lead him to worry, and God knows best. When a married woman sees an ugly man, it could be a sign. On negative feelings, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees an ugly man, this may be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a man trying to attack me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a man trying to attack me in a dream could be an indication of the harm that will befall him, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees... He attacks her, it may portend evil, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees someone attacking her, it may express difficulties, and God knows the unseen. Just as an unmarried girl sees a stranger attacking her, this may indicate sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a man kneading dough in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a man kneading dough in a dream. It could be a sign of benefit, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a man kneading dough, this may lead to the benefit he obtains, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When the dreamer sees a person kneading dough, this may indicate getting rid of problems and reconciliation, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream a person kneading dough, perhaps This symbolizes peace, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a man washing clothes in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best, as seeing a person performing ablution may indicate abandoning worries, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees a man performing ablution, It may relieve him of anxiety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees someone performing ablution in a dream, this may be a sign of sustenance, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man urinating in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man urinating in a dream could be a sign of kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High. I know that if a married man sees someone urinating, it may indicate food, and God knows best. But if the dreamer sees a man urinating on him, he may push him to have money, but he spends it on useless things, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone exploding in a dream could be the interpretation of a dream where a person explodes. Himself in a dream is a sign that he has wronged himself and that God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a person blowing himself up in a dream, this may be evidence of his bad behavior towards himself and those around him, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about a white face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a white face in a dream: A white face in visions is praiseworthy; Because it expresses the purity of the soul, and in interpretation it has a high status, and it was said: Whoever sees as if the color of the face has changed and become white, then he is in good condition. It's positive. The change relates to the social or professional status of the viewer, and the whiteness of a woman’s face indicates her purity, the purity of her bed, and her celibacy. A special and happy occasion, and this interpretation applies to married and pregnant women. Interpretation of white skin in a dream. White skin in a dream is one of the good symbols that convey a positive and praiseworthy message to the dreamer, heralding the beautiful days that he will live in reality. As for seeing a white face, it is positive that it foretells things to the dreamer. The goodness that will happen to him in reality is an indication that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better and his financial, social and even emotional conditions will improve. Interpretation of white skin in a dream for a woman - If a woman sees that her skin has turned into a beautiful white and pink color in a dream, this means that she is living a life of glory. And honor in reality. As for the bright and impressive whiteness of a woman’s skin in a dream, it indicates her purity, morals, and good reputation in her protective life. - If a pregnant woman, single or married, sees that her skin and face radiate whiteness in a dream, then the dream indicates good events that will occur In her life in reality, which will make her a happy and cheerful person. Doesn't disturb the mood at all.
